title: The Little Book of Big Quotes: Volume I
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B00LXP9R96 Inspirational. Motivational. Insightful. Truthful. Spanning from friendship, love, wisdom, life, and death, these quotes present a mind-expanding collection of ideas that will inspire and can change your life.There is space for the reader to write notes or doodle their responses to each quote. Perfect for teachers, leaders, managers, coaches, philosophers, intellectuals, free-thinkers, and everyone in between! Free downloadable PDF excerpt here https://goo.gl/K5Wor6.
author: Carlos Salinas
